td.a: Remote Learning to Continue Through SY19-20

nav.div: Wilmette Public Schools District 39 » News » What's New » District 39 Closure Extended through April 30

div.img:
Illinois Gov. J.B. Pritzker announced on March 30 that the executive stay-at-home order for all Illinois residents will extend through April 30, keeping all school districts -- including District 39 -- closed through the end of the month.
All District 39 buildings will remain closed and remote learning will continue in District 39 throughout the duration of the closure. District 39 schools had previously been closed through April 13.
